title: Hand Engraved Social Stationery on Ephemera Society
content:
New article about what is engraving for print application, and, specifically, for the stationery trade in the U.S.

[http://www.ephemerasociety.org/articles/collins.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140424150751/http:/www.ephemerasociety.org/articles/collins.html "http://www.ephemerasociety.org/articles/collins.html")
author: nancy sharon collins
